name: Maps of the Known World
description:
Type the words to keep the image from blurring.

The footage is taken from my grandmother's home videos.

Recommended that you play in fullscreen with headphones, if you can :) (and a note that it seems to not run in Chrome)

With help from the following shaders:

  • Kino's Gaussian Blur: https://github.com/keijiro/GaussianBlur/blob/master/Assets/GaussianBlurFilter.sh...
  • Shaders Laboratory's Triangle Mosaic shader: http://www.shaderslab.com/demo-73---triangle-mosaic.html
